attributes.action: Help the energy chrisis. I would agree to billions of pounds being spent on fields of solar power generators that can save us our environment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Innovations this year have been more than a success. A new era with an image of technology, intelligence, computations. Human workforce has managed so far to create one from nothing by a knowledge above natural powers, Science. 
With the new innovations in the solar power panels, new panels are improved for power generation on long durations and work more efficiently.
Fields of these panels can be used along with electrically charged cars and devices and our extra costs on oil can be cut off.
